description:
About us:

Do you want to help shape the future of retail? Here’s a thought – how about doing that, while helping people get a sneak peek of what the world is creating at the same time? We are Smartech Retail Group – a destination for innovation at the world’s best department stores. We let people discover, try, and play with the latest innovation, gaming, and e-mobility across our 12 experience-led concept stores globally. Because honestly, why should retail be boring? If you want to create immersive experiences and unforgettable memories, this is your chance!

This role plays an essential part in the Smartech team. We are looking for an experienced Head of Marketing to help transform the Marketing and Communications of our innovative brand by working at the forefront of creating unforgettable and unique marketing activities, identifying new commercial opportunities and contributing, supporting and managing one of our core commercials teams globally.

Objectives of this Role
• Develop and execute strategic marketing plans in alignment with the company's overall business goals and objectives.
• Manage the marketing budget effectively by allocating resources to different channels and campaigns for maximum impact and ROI.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, sales, and operations, to ensure alignment and integration of marketing efforts.
• Lead a team of marketing professionals, providing guidance, mentorship, and performance management to drive high levels of productivity and accomplishment.
• Oversee the conception and production of marketing materials such as magazines, videos, and online content that effectively communicate our product offerings and brand value propositions.
• Drive the development and execution of digital marketing strategies, including website optimization, SEO/SEM, email marketing, social media, and online advertising.
• Develop and maintain strong relationships with external partners, agencies, and vendors to leverage their expertise in achieving marketing objectives.
• Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics, including customer acquisition cost, conversion rates, and ROI, to constantly improve campaigns and drive business growth.
• Conduct market and competitive research to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and potential business partnerships.

We are looking for you:

With a global experience in marketing and how to build a brand. You are a goal-oriented, self-motivated people-person with excellent communication and interpersonal skills who thrives in a dynamic environment – always ready to roll up your sleeves and get things done. With your ability to understand marketing, communication, and social media, you build strong and long-lasting relationships and ensure delivery is both on time and on quality. Impeccably well-presented, positive, confident, and a team player. If you want to grow your skills in a thriving company that knows that retail is not dying – as long as it's not boring – you are the changemaker we are looking for. Join us to create immersive experiences that amaze and amuse as we continue to shape tomorrow's future!

The ideal candidate has:
• Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities.
• Superior interpersonal and organizational skills.
• Confidence to use initiative.
• A positive and approachable manner.
• Good time management skills and the ability to prioritize.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• Adaptability to change.
• Willingness to embrace new ideas and processes.
• Interest in developing your own skills and knowledge.
• The ability to be challenged on your advice and to accept criticism.
• Able to make quick but rational decisions when working under pressure.

START: Immediately

LOCATION: NYC

JOB HOURS: Full time

BANDING: 150K$ base + Commissions and bonuses to match
